theoryTitle: The Davy Back Fight Will Return in a Major Way
theoryText: Many fans theorize that the Davy Back Fight introduced in the Long Ring Long Land arc will play a significant role later in the series. Some believe that Luffy and Shanks might have a Davy Back Fight instead of a traditional battle, or that the Rocks Pirates used Davy Back Fights to recruit their powerful crew members. Recent manga chapters have supported this theory by revealing that Rocks D. Xebec worshipped Davy Jones and used Davy Back Fights to gather the Rocks Pirates.

evidence.description: The extensive introduction of Davy Back Fight rules and games suggests they will be important later

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: References to Rocks Pirates and recent manga revelations

sources.title: One Piece: Davy Back Fights, Explained
More Than 20 Years Later, One Piece Is Finally Redeeming Its Most Controversial Story Arc

theoryTitle: Zoro and Sanji's 10-Second Teamwork Foreshadows Future Cooperation
theoryText: The iconic moment where Zoro proposes working with Sanji for just 10 seconds in episode 211 foreshadows future moments where the two rivals must cooperate against powerful enemies. Fans believe this establishes a pattern where, despite their constant bickering, Zoro and Sanji can put aside their differences when it truly matters for the crew's sake.

evidence.description: Zoro swallowing his pride to propose cooperation shows maturity and foreshadows similar moments
